slides.message: A big big shoutout to the social club folks here in Calgary for helping with the Chess Beer O'clock! Your support, help and vibes made the event turn out to be super fun and smooth sailing. Appreciate y'all so much.

Shout out to Franca for being the mother (admin) of all the other mothers (admins) across CM. It was so wonderful to have a CD that not only cared about me and my growth, but also wanted all the admins to love the work they do and be appreciated for it. Whatever love you send her way isn't enough!
